name: redis-streams-broker
description: This package is a broker to redis stream data type, This package provides guaranteed message delivery feature with acknowledgement.

scripts.test: npm run redisstart && npm run mocha && npm run redisstop && npm run redisstart && npm run redisstop
scripts.redisstart: npm run redisstop || node -v && docker run --name streamz -p 6379:6379 -itd --rm redis:latest
scripts.push: npm whoami && npm version patch && npm test && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd .. && git push --tags

author: Laukik
